submissions.name: Message Machine: Reverse-Engineering the 2012 Campaign
submissions.creator: Propublica
submissions.description: "Political campaigns send many variations of each email to supporters. We've been collecting emails from political campaigns and tracking the variations. Here you can explore those emails."

submissions.name: Mass Surveillance in America: A Timeline of Loosening Laws and Practices
submissions.creator: Propublica
submissions.description: A historical overview of the changing surveillance laws in America

submissions.name: For Eli Manning, 150 Games and Counting
submissions.creator: The New York Times
submissions.description: "On Sunday, Manning will start his 150th consecutive game for the Giants. Below, how his streak compares to the streaks of nearly 500 quarterbacks who have started a game since 1970."

submissions.name: The Refugee Project
submissions.creator: Hyperakt, Ekene Ijeoma, Oak
submissions.description: "The Refugee Project is a narrative, temporal map of refugee migrations since 1975. We’ve used UN data to visualize refugee volumes over time and added a layer of historical content to help explain the events that caused some of the largest refugee movements of the last four decades."

submissions.name: Bud’s Story, from the Records
submissions.creator: Propublica
submissions.description: Private Arthur ‘Bud’ Kelder died as a POW in the Philippines during World War II. His parents always hoped that his body would eventually be sent home. But despite clues, the military has never recovered his remains. Here are letters and others documents from his case from 1941 to 1950. The documents and photographs below are either from the National Archive or courtesy of John Eakin."

submissions.name: A Rogue State Along Two Rivers
submissions.creator: New York Times
submissions.description: Interesting responsive "map timeline" that manages to keep the really interesting bits for the mobile layout.

submissions.name: Record-Setting Effort by Howard, but Belgium Ousts U.S.
submissions.creator: The New York Times
submissions.description: An interactive overview of the BEL & USA World cup game goal attempts

submissions.name: Building Toward Disaster
submissions.creator: The Seattle Times
submissions.description: This graphic was built to let readers look through the history of the tragic 2014 landslide in Washington's Snohomish County. We tied the timeline to aerial photos, allowing readers to see the movement of the river over time, and provided data on the construction, logging, red flags, and attempted fixes. By pivoting to a vertical timeline, it works well on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

submissions.name: Islamic Terrorist Attacks All over the World, 1983 - 2015
submissions.creator: Kirby
submissions.description:
A frame work helps you visualize events across time and space with bubbles of magnitude of events. Device friendly.
（The url is an example of visualization of Islamic terrorist attacks from 1983 to 2015.）
